column4: I'm trying to install some custom GIMP brushes on feisty - which folder do I stick them in, and how can I access said folder?
somehere in ~/.gimp2
no you don't
stop messing around
as long as you say "no" it's not a problem
no-one has hacked you, some one is trying to access your machine
random person on the internet
did you read the debugging on that webpage ubottu sent you
i m novice to Ubuntu, I already went thru that page earlier and installed Cheese, but tat dont seems to solve the problem :(
installing cheese doesn't "fix" anything it will just allow you to use your camera if you configure it
what shud b done in tat case
please try to talk in clear english - text speak makes it hard to follow
i apologize
first i need to check actually if everything is fine with my webcam and secondly if there are issues with the driver
service networking restart
(sudo too)
i get - restart: Unknown instance:
try network rather than networking
I've not got an ubuntu machine here to verify for you
: i get : network: unrecognized service
ahhh uknown instance on networking, what's it complaining about
sorry, miss-read the error
